articles.description: Kriti Sanon aces Ranicore in a beautiful pink saree for the promotions of Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya
articles.content: Kriti Sanon is keeping busy with the promotional campaign of her upcoming film, Teri Baaton Mein Aisa Uljha Jiya. For one of the events recently, the actress was spotted in a rani pink saree that tra… [+1639 chars]
